UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Mechanistic Insights into the Leishmanicidal and Bactericidal Activities of Batroxicidin, a Cathelicidin-Related Peptide from a South American Viper ( Bothrops atrox).
Literature.Author: Dematei A, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Murine macrophage cells J774:50% Cytotoxicity=2.14±0.2 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cytotoxicity=29.4±13.38 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.93µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1.87µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=7.48µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=3.74µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1.87µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=0.94µM),Leishmania amazonensis MHOM/BR/73/M2269(EC50=6.74±0.33µM)
